content: I've been taking my grandmother to her doctor's appointments since my parents are busy with work, and it's been really nice spending quality time with her and hearing her stories about when she was younger. Last week, we had to take her to the emergency room because she fell and hurt her hip, but thankfully it was just a minor injury. Can you recommend any exercises or activities that can help her improve her balance and reduce the risk of future falls, especially since she's been feeling a bit down about it?
